Package com.alibaba.graphscope.ds

Interface VertexRange<VID_T>

  • Type Parameters:
    VID_T - vertex id type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    com.alibaba.fastffi.CXXPointer, com.alibaba.fastffi.FFIPointer, com.alibaba.fastffi.FFIType
    public interface VertexRange<VID_T>
extends com.alibaba.fastffi.FFIPointer, com.alibaba.fastffi.CXXPointer
    Vertex Range is an abstraction for a range of vertices. Corresponding C++ grape::VertexRange
